statements: SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT count(*) FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id < 50 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) AND username LIKE '%user%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users WHERE password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT access_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level >= 5 ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE access_control.access_level > 3;
SELECT username, access_level FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN access_control ON users.user_id = access_control.user_id WHERE access_control.access_level < 2 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 2 AND username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.permission_id WHERE username = 'alice_smith';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, a.resource_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN access_control a ON ur.user_role_id = a.user_role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, a.resource_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN access_control a ON ur.user_role_id = a.user_role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM roles r JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE r.role_id = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
